short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight browser extension that displays FAST contract data for active NBA players.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides immediate access to NBA player contract data. Enter the name of any active player and view the annual salaries for their current contract. Great for NBA salary cap nerds and armchair general managers. Get FAST and CURRENT contract data without having to open a new browser window.
